name: asea-documentation
description: ASEA Documentation auto generated using typedoc

scripts.gen-json-schema-all: pnpm run gen-json-schema-en && pnpm run gen-json-schema-fr
scripts.gen-ts-from-json-schema-all: pnpm run gen-ts-from-json-schema-en && pnpm run gen-ts-from-json-schema-fr
scripts.gen-i18n-from-json-schema-all: pnpm run gen-i18n-from-json-schema-en && pnpm run gen-i18n-from-json-schema-fr
scripts.gen-typedoc-all: pnpm run gen-typedoc-en && pnpm run gen-typedoc-fr
scripts.gen-typedoc-en: rm -r ./output-docs/en; lang=en typedoc ./output-ts/en --name 'AWS SEA Config Docs' --hideGenerator --excludePrivate --localize en --templateStrings ./output-translations/translation-en.json --theme ./src/typedoc-theme --out ./output-docs/en --readme ./src/README-en.md
scripts.gen-typedoc-fr: rm -r ./output-docs/fr; lang=fr typedoc ./output-ts/en --name 'Documents Config AWS SEA' --hideGenerator --excludePrivate --localize fr --templateStrings ./output-translations/translation-fr.json --theme ./src/typedoc-theme --out ./output-docs/fr --readme ./src/README-fr.md
scripts.gen-docs: pnpm run gen-json-schema-all && pnpm run gen-ts-from-json-schema-all && pnpm run gen-i18n-from-json-schema-all && pnpm run gen-typedoc-all
